```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <meta charset="utf-8">
        <title> comma delimited numbers </title>

        <script>

            function compare(x, y) {
                x = parseint(x);
                y = parseint(y);
                if (x < y)
                    return -1;
                else if (y > x)
                    return 1;
                else
                    return 0;
            }

            function sort_nums(el) {
                var data = el.innerHTML;
                var arr = data.split(",");

                var output = "this list has " + arr.length + " numbers.";

                var avg = 0;

                for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++)
                    avg += parseint(arr[i]);

                avg = avg / arr.length;

                arr.sort(compare);

                output += "<br>the average number is " + avg + "<br>the median is " + arr[498];

                document.getElementById("results").innerHTML = output;
            }


        </script>

    </head>
    <body>
        <p id="nums" onclick="sort_nums("this");">
```
